@MoHFW_INDIA @PMOIndia @drharshvardhan @AshwiniKChoubey @PIB_India @PIBHomeAffairs @mygovindia @MIB_India @MoCA_GoI @COVIDNewsByMIB @CovidIndiaSeva Nanometer size of viruses could travel anywhere attached with dust particles thought air & water, there's no physical contact required.
isolation, sanitizer & mask is medical industry game to earn money, people are dying due to Pneumonia & other disease blamed to coronavirus.
